description:
A young child who was found by Fate`s subordinates, Caro and Eriol, during their off-day. Because no one knows her relatives, Nanoha decided to take care of her.
Later, Vivio is revealed to be a clone of the "Saint regina" of the ancient belka world. At end of the series, Nanoha officially adopted her as her own child.
name: Takamachi Vivio
